data.actual_result: It minimises and maximises then shows the join dialouge
data.expected_result: It should come up with the invite no problem
data.short_description: Discord minimises and maximises when an invite is viewed from the internet on dual monitors
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a dual monitor setup - Have discord in one screen and Chrome in on the other (Browser doesn't matter) - Open an invite in Chrome - Watch the screen with discord
